013package org.apache.juneau.internal;
014
015import java.util.*;
016import java.util.function.*;
017
018/**
019 * A function that takes in 2 arguments.
020 *
021 * <ul class='seealso'>
022 * </ul>
023 *
024 * @param <A> The first argument.
025 * @param <B> The second argument.
026 * @param <R> The return type.
027 */
028@SuppressWarnings("javadoc")
029@FunctionalInterface
030public interface Function2<A,B,R> {
031
032   R apply(A a, B b);
033
034   default <V> Function2<A, B, V> andThen(Function<? super R, ? extends V> after) {
035      Objects.requireNonNull(after);
036      return (A a, B b) -> after.apply(apply(a, b));
037   }
038}
